705368f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lafayette Avenue - Classon Avenue
705368f-a.text: Lafayette Avenue, north Tide, between Classon Avenue anc Emerson Tlace, showing Public -chool No. 43. Board of Education of the City of New York October 3, 1929

705370f-b.title: Brooklyn: Lafayette Avenue - Classon Avenue
705370f-b.text:
Lafayette Avenue, north side, west from Classon Avenue, showing Public School No 45. View 2 shows the northeast cenner of
Lafayette and Steuben Street.
P. L. Sperr  View 1: Auaust 24, 1941
NO REEROEUCTIONS  View 2: October 12, 1941

703613f-a.title: Brooklyn: Classon Avenue - Lafayette Avenue
703613f-a.text:
Classon Ave., west side, north from No. 322, just north of Lafayette Ave. The 88th precinck No. 298 Classon Ave. is in the building displaying the flag. The buiiding in the foreground, at left,
partially seen was rased in 1928.
1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, another view.
1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
